metadata.dc:author: Margolis, J
metadata.dc:description: An operational group is defined; how operational groups theory was applied at an ISSSTE clinic is described. It is underlined how operational groups promote change around the corerstone of a "task". The vicissitudes of an operational group with four psychiatrists who worked in community psychiatry at the ISSSTE, are described.
metadata.dc:title: Psicoterapia en grupo. Grupos operativos en el ISSSTE.
[Group psychotherapy. Operative groups at the Instituto del servico de seguridad Social de los Trabajadores del Estado (ISSSTE)].
